resources.string: Device selected. Go to charts section to start capturing data
Bluetooth connectivity is not supported on this device!
Bluetooth turned off. Please turn on Bluetooth connectivity
Step #1: Pair your MindWave headset with your phone bluetooth.
step #2: Go to \'Devices\' tab and select the headset from the list.
Step #3: Switch to \'Charts\' tab and tap Play to start capturing data.
